text:
Provab Technosoft is an award-winning software development company. It develops next-generation travel technology solutions, custom web applications and native mobile applications for global customers. It is headquartered in Bangalore India and has a customer base in 48 countries.
Awards and recognition.
In 2019, PROVAB received the Iconic Achiever's award for being the leading travel technology company.
In 2018, PROVAB received the Business & Service Excellence award.
In 2017, The CEO of Provab Technosoft, Anand Shukla was felicitated with Young Entrepreneur award for outstanding achievements in business and social service.
In 2015, PROVAB received the Leadership Award.
